extendedInfo.description: "Galaxy: Eternal Warfare" is a free fast-paced inter-galactic strategy game offering unlimited game play. Enjoy round after round of addictive adrenaline pumping action in this real time strategy game. Wage war against other players in the addictive multiplayer version of this online war strategy game and enjoy cut-throat competition with players all around the world!If you're prepared for Eternal Warfare, then get the best strategy game available!TRY IT FREE!Key Details:* Build up ships and send ruthless swarms of them to crush your enemy.* An awesome hybrid of classic arcade-action & real-time multiplayer strategy game.* Over 50 different unique maps or "Galaxies" and endless single-player strategy game play.* 15 unique mission types (including a tutorial): take on multiple non-player characters, test your powers of foresight in stealth, rebel against an established enemy clan or take on the ultimate real time strategy game challenge in Titan!* Adapt to the non-player character's strategies and advance your way through the 8 different difficulty ranks from Private to Admiral as you get better, smarter and faster!* There are 6,000 different combinations of maps, mission types, and difficulty ranks for truly Eternal Warfare.* Take on the world in multiplayer mode, waging a real time strategy game war with players from across the globe. Multiplayer mode is a cross-platform online strategy game so you can play with all of your friends no matter what their gaming platform.* Stunning Special effects, electrifying music and an intuitive interface.*** We listen: ***We appreciate your feedback. We are passionate about game development and want to do everything we can to make your game play experience something special.For support or to contact the developers email us at:far4apps@gmail.com

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Just needs a ranking system and more players
reviews.author: Trey Tarango

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.comment: Good graphics and simple yet addicting and fun gameplay. Altogether a great game!
reviews.author: Riley Ovan

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Finally an excellent mp strategy for android - and cheap too! AWESOME gameplay and just generally great. Addictive and fun!
reviews.author: A Google User
